remarks: Isomorphism C has domain of lattice atoms that are not less than or equal to the fiducial co-atom ` w ` .  The value is a one-dimensional subspace generated by the pair consisting of the ` iota_ ` vector below and the endomorphism ring unit.  Definition of phi(q) in [Crawley] p. 121.  Note that we use the fixed atom ` ( ( oc ` k ) ` w ) ` to represent the p in their "Choose an atom p..." on line 21.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Dec-2013.)
statement:
df-dic $p |- DIsoC = ( k e. _V |-> ( w e. ( LHyp ` k ) |-> ( q e. { r e. ( Atoms ` k ) | -. r ( le ` k ) w } |-> { <. f , s >. | ( f = ( s ` ( iota_ g e. ( ( LTrn ` k ) ` w ) ( g ` ( ( oc ` k ) ` w ) ) = q ) ) /\ s e. ( ( TEndo ` k ) ` w ) ) } ) ) ) $.
$d f g k q r s w $.
